marklogic.body: Are you an overweight person? If you are not you really shouldnt worry about how to lose weight fast, worry about being healthy. Diet pills dont Always work they only make a person become dependent on them so that once they stop taking them they get fat...Try using actual green tea not the pills! A way to lose weight is to simply eat healthier foods and try excercizing. Don't eat late at night and do not eat foods that will defer Weight loss. Its that simple...a pill isnt going to change your weight.
